acceptAgreement().details: For Partnership: Activates 5% equity grant (non-forfeitable)      For Settlement: Starts 48h withdrawal timelock

initiateSettlementWithdrawal().details: Funds move to pending withdrawals, then creator calls withdraw()

proposePartnership(string,string).details: This function enforces:      - Exactly 100M MON payment (performance bond)      - 5% fully diluted equity (non-forfeitable)      - No clawback, no repurchase, no drag-along      - Creator has final termination authority

params._equityDocumentHash: IPFS hash of equity certificate with full terms
params._termsHash: IPFS hash of complete partnership agreement

proposeSettlement(string).details: This is a clean break option:      - 50M MON payment (non-refundable upon acceptance)      - No equity, no ongoing relationship      - Creator withdraws after 48h timelock

terminateAgreement(string).details: Partnership bond returned to Rumble via pull pattern      Note: This is the ONLY way partnership can be terminated

withdraw().details: Anyone with pending withdrawals can pull their funds      Prevents reentrancy, ensures atomicity

acceptAgreement().notice: Creator accepts proposed agreement after 24h review period

cancelProposal().notice: Rumble cancels proposal before creator accepts

initiateSettlementWithdrawal().notice: Creator initiates settlement withdrawal after 48h timelock

proposePartnership(string,string).notice: Rumble proposes PARTNERSHIP: 100M MON + 5% fully diluted equity

proposeSettlement(string).notice: Rumble proposes SETTLEMENT: 50M MON (one-time, final, no equity)

withdraw().notice: Pull pattern withdrawal - most secure method
